nodes.bodyText:
Better to use normalizedWorkingBranch, as workingBranch could contain special characters not allowed in filenames.

                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + workingBranch
          
          
            
                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + normalizedWorkingBranch
